A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Beautiful graphics and interesting story. Wonderfully unpredictable and dares to go new directions. The two stars come from it unfortunately not feeling like a star wars movie at all. Like Rogue One\, it's a wonderful story\, but not what I want to see when thinking of Star Wars. Except for a few Characters (Luke\, Rose\, Poe\, Leia)\, I cannot care about any of them. Daisy Ridley and Adam Driver present a powerful and masterful performance\, however their characters feel like fan-fiction and unnecessary. Worth a watch\, but the series has lost my interest with this installment\, and I will not be holding my breath for the next one.
